Detailed Description

A SquareMatrixAlias class.

Author:
Lee Netherton
The SquareMatrixAlias class provides all the functionality from the MatrixAlias class, but add specific functions intended for square matricies (like inverse(), and determinant()). It also has specific square matrix write functions like identity().

Definition at line 1143 of file matrix.h.

const unsigned int  size
)  [inline]
 

Default constructor.Pointer constructor.

To create a square matrix that will access a pre-available data array.

Parameters:
data Pointer to data array. This will be the data storage for the matrix.
size Number of rows and columns the matrix has.
